desc:
1. High-efficiency fan with TEC cooling module to quickly cool down the camera.

2. Automatic intelligent temperature control design.

3. Snap-on installation, easy to install and remove, compatible with more cameras.

4. Can be used with or without a camera cage, lighter and freer to use.

5. Compatible with V-Mount Battery Mount Plate Kit 4064B / 4063B, with V-Mount batteries and other uses, convenient power supply.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Cooling Fan for Sony / Canon / FUJIFILM Selected Cameras 4815

SmallRig Cooling Fan for Sony / Canon / FUJIFILM Selected Cameras 4815 is designed to cool down Sony mirrorless cameras and enhance the recording duration of high-specification videos. The cooling system utilizes a high-efficiency fan with a TEC cooling module to quickly cool the camera and effectively alleviate overheating problems. Built-in intelligent temperature control design, the cooling system automatically adjusts the cooling system power according to the temperature of the contact surface between the cooling system and the camera, easy to use. Snap-on mounting design, easy to remove and install, compatible with more models. Can be used with or without a camera cage, and it is lighter and freer to use. The cooling system is compatible with V-Mount Battery Mount Plate Kit 4064B / 4063B, with V-Mount battery 3579 / 3580 / 4292 use, heat dissipation, and power supply without worry.

Note:

1. After installing this product, the camera's LCD screen will not be able to be stowed. If you need to store the LCD screen, please remove the cooling system first.

2. This product does not have a built-in battery and needs to be powered by connecting to an external power source for proper operation.

3. This product is not waterproof, please do not store or use it in a humid environment.

4. Do not block the air inlet or outlet when the Cooling System is in operation.

5. Do not use the Cooling System to continue cooling the camera when the camera is not operating to prevent condensation inside the camera.

6. When not in use, press and hold the power switch for about 2 seconds to enter standby mode or disconnect the power cord to turn off the device.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig HawkLock Quick Release Cage for Canon EOS R5 Mark II 4977

SmallRig HawkLock Quick Release Cage for Canon EOS R5 Mark II 4977 is meticulously crafted to provide comprehensive protection and a multitude of expansion interfaces for your camera. The cage secures the camera in place with a single 1/4"-20 screw at the base and two locating blocks on the sides, incorporating built-in silicone pads to prevent scratches on the camera.

The cage provides unobstructed access to all of the camera's buttons, slots, screen, battery compartment, and other interfaces. It also features a built-in HawkLock quick-release patent structure, allowing for one-touch quick and secure attachment with a self-locking mechanism, eliminating the need for additional reinforcement. The bi-directional mounting design enables free installation orientation.

The top and sides of the cage are equipped with H21 NATO rails, facilitating quick attachment of accessories such as top handles (ID 4483, 3766), monitor mounts (ID 2904B), and magic arms (ID 3874) for expanding monitoring capabilities. It also features multiple 1/4"-20 threaded holes and 1/4"-20 locating holes for compatibility with side handles (ID 2093, 4346), and other accessories. It supports the expansion of accessories such as magic arms (ID 3874, 3875), monitor mounts (ID 2904B), Manfrotto baseplates (ID 1280, 2458),  L-shaped mount plate kits (ID MD4360), and others. The right side of the cage features dual horizontal 1/4"-20 threaded holes for attaching tripods (ID 3989), ensuring stability during vertical shooting.

The cage features ordinary strap slots compatible with wrist straps (ID 3848, 2456), an innovative strap slot for downward hanging for extra lens protection, and a QD interface compatible with QD quick-release shoulder straps (ID 4118).

The Arca-Swiss quick-release baseplate allows for direct mounting on Arca-type tripods (ID 4060, 4353) and DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro stabilizers, enabling swift transitions between stabilizer, handheld, and tripod setups. Moreover, the cage incorporates a magnetic dual head wrench at the bottom for easy assembly and disassembly.

The cage comes with a durable scratch-resistant tempered glass screen protector with a surface hardness of 9H and an IK03 impact resistance test rating.

Note:

1. Remove the side locating blocks on both sides of the cage before mounting.

2. The tempered glass screen protector is intentionally designed to be slightly smaller than the screen edges to prevent dust from entering through larger gaps, constituting a normal design feature.

2. Instantly insert your phone with case into the video cage, seamlessly switching between everyday and professional shooting scenarios.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Mobile Video Cage Flagship Edition for iPhone 16 Pro 4828

SmallRig Mobile Video Cage Flagship Edition for iPhone 16 Pro 4828 is a versatile mobile video cage meticulously designed to elevate your video recording, live streaming, and cinematic filmmaking to professional levels. This comprehensive set includes a phone protective case, a T-mount lens backplate, a trim ring, a video cage, and a TUP soft frame.

The equipped with a quick-release T-mount backplate phone case serves as daily protection. The T-mount backplate can be switched by a trim ring, a 17mm threaded lens backplate, or a 67mm magnetic filter adapter for enhanced optical output. The phone can be quickly mounted into the cage, featuring multiple 1/4"-20 anti-twist threaded holes and cold shoe mounts to expand it with accessories like handles, tripods, microphones, and lights, enhancing your shooting experience, while the integrated quick-release interfaces ensure seamless connectivity. 

The cage features a side-mounted wrist strap and shoulder strap holes compatible with professional straps under 2mm in diameter, for convenient carrying during shooting breaks. The hollowed-out design of the cage preserves access to all iPhone buttons, ports, radar system, ultra-wide lens, and wireless charging.

The quick lock mechanism allows for convenient, secure phone mounting and dismounting, preventing accidental unlocking. The all-metal construction of the cage provides comprehensive protection for your phone, aiding in shock absorption and safeguarding against scratches. The set enables the phone to be used without the case for underwater shooting or high-performance cooling, securely housed within the cage alongside the TPU soft frame.

Note: The phone case width is 75.6mm / 2.97in. When using a third-party phone case with the cage, ensure accurate measurements for compatibility.

title: SmallRig Cage for Canon EOS R5 Mark II 4978
desc:
1. One-piece design for seamless camera protection without obstructing interfaces.

2. Incorporates a three-point locking system for stability and precision, utilizing a 1/4"-20 screw at the base and two locating blocks on the sides.

3. Multiple expansion interfaces, including 1/4"-20 threaded holes, 1/4"-20 locating holes, 3/8"-16 threaded holes, ARRI 3/8"-16 locating holes, cold shoe mounts, QD interfaces, and strap slots for diverse shooting scenarios.

4. The incorporated Arca-Swiss quick-release baseplate is compatible with Arca-type tripods and DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro stabilizers.

5. Includes durable scratch-resistant 9H hardness tempered glass screen protector, featuring  IK03 impact resistance test rating.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Cage for Canon EOS R5 Mark II 4978

SmallRig Cage for Canon EOS R5 Mark II 4978 is meticulously crafted to provide comprehensive protection and a multitude of expansion interfaces for your camera. The cage features a secure locking mechanism with a bottom 1/4"-20 screw and two side locating blocks, along with integrated silicone pads to prevent scratches on your camera. Designed with precision, the cage does not obstruct access to the camera's buttons, interfaces, dials, flip screen, battery compartment, or card slot.

The cage features multiple 1/4"-20 threaded holes and 1/4"-20 locating holes for compatibility with auxiliary accessories like side handles (ID 2093, 4346), magic arms (ID 3874, 3875), monitor mounts (ID 2904B), Manfrotto baseplates (ID 1280, 2458), and L-shaped mount plate kits (ID MD4360). It also incorporates a cold shoe mount for attaching microphones and lighting accessories.

The cage features ordinary strap slots compatible with wrist straps (ID 3848, 2456), an innovative strap slot for downward hanging for extra lens protection, and a QD interface compatible with QD quick-release shoulder straps (ID 4118).

The Arca-Swiss quick-release baseplate allows for direct mounting on Arca-type tripods (ID 4060, 4353) and DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro stabilizers, enabling swift transitions between stabilizer, handheld, and tripod setups. Moreover, the cage incorporates a magnetic dual head wrench at the bottom for easy assembly and disassembly.

The cage comes with a durable scratch-resistant tempered glass screen protector with a surface hardness of 9H and an IK03 impact resistance test rating.

Note:

1. Remove the side locating blocks on both sides of the cage before mounting.

2. The tempered glass screen protector is intentionally designed to be slightly smaller than the screen edges to prevent dust from entering through larger gaps, constituting a normal design feature.

Work With

Canon EOS R5 Mark II

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig LA-S280 Spring Cushioned Lighting Stand 4891

SmallRig LA-S280 Spring Cushioned Lighting Stand 4891 features integrated spring cushioning at the tripod node to reduce the impact and prevent equipment damage.

With a versatile working height ranging from 94cm to 280cm (37 - 110.2 inches), this light stand adapts seamlessly to diverse shooting environments. Compact and portable at just 94cm (37 inches) when stored, it boasts a robust maximum load capacity of 5kg (11lbs).

The stand is constructed of nylon and iron, showcasing a durable 35mm (1.4in) center column diameter for exceptional strength and a high load-bearing capacity, ideal for demanding tasks.

The precision-engineered adapter features a stainless steel flat head, incorporating a 1/4"-20 threaded hole for wide compatibility. The flat head design guarantees a secure and precise fit during installation.

Target Users and Scenarios: Ideal for portrait photography, still life photography, live streaming, interviews, e-commerce shoots, and more.

4. Multiple built-in interfaces to meet all your needs: 1/4"-20 threaded hole, ARRI 3/8"-16 locating hole, cold shoe mount, etc.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig “Retro" Cage for FUJIFILM X-M5 4892

SmallRig “Retro" Cage for FUJIFILM X-M5 4892 is designed to protect the camera and provide multiple expansion interfaces to facilitate content creation. The retro-style cage mounts to the camera with a 1/4"-20 screw at the bottom and one side lock on the left, and the silicone pads prevent scratches. The built-in ergonomic wooden grip provides a firm grip. The cage provides unobstructed access to the camera buttons, card slots, LCD screen, MCS switch, battery, etc.  The cage has multiple built-in interfaces to meet all your needs: 1/4"-20 threaded hole, 1/4”-20 locating hole, cold shoe mount, strap hole, etc. It is also compatible with Top Handle (ID: 2736), Microphone (ID: 3487), RGB Video light (ID: 4055), Wrist Strap (ID: 3848), etc. Besides, an Arca-Swiss quick-release plate on the bottom is compatible with Arca-type tripods (ID 4060, 4353) and DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro gimbals, which allows for easy transitions between gimbals, handheld and tripod shooting. There is a built-in double-headed wrench on the bottom for easy disassembly and assembly. The cage comes with a windshield with a built-in cold shoe mount, which reduces wind noise by 15 dB. Built-in silicone on the bottom to prevent scratching the hot shoe. The cage comes with the exclusive hot shoe cover imprinted with the “FUJIFILM” sound wave and the year of foundation as our tribute to FUJIFILM. It also comes with a shutter release button to ensure a soft and comfortable finger touch.

Note: Variations in each product are a natural result of the hand-polished finish on the cage.

title: SmallRig Mobile Video Cage Basic Edition for iPhone 16 Pro 5008
desc:

2. Compatibility with the quick-release optical expansion ecosystem allows swift interchange of various optical accessories, ensuring secure and precise mounting.

3. Brand-new one-press installation mechanism of the video cage eliminates the risk of accidental unlocking.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Mobile Video Cage Basic Edition for iPhone 16 Pro 5008

SmallRig Mobile Video Cage Basic Edition for iPhone 16 Pro 5008 is a versatile cage meticulously crafted for the iPhone 16 Pro to enhance professional-grade video shooting, live streaming, and cinematic filmmaking. This product comprises a dedicated video cage, a T-mount backplate, and a TPU soft frame.

The video cage features multiple 1/4"-20 anti-twist threaded holes and cold shoe mounts, facilitating the attachment of handles, tripods, microphones, and lighting accessories to elevate the professionalism of your shooting experience, while the integrated quick-release interfaces ensure seamless connectivity.

The standard quick-release T-mount backplate can be swapped for a trim ring, a 17mm threaded lens backplate, or a 67mm magnetic filter adapter, enabling a broader range of high-quality optical outputs.

The cage features a side-mounted wrist strap and shoulder strap holes compatible with professional straps under 2mm in diameter, for convenient carrying during shooting breaks. The hollowed-out design of the cage preserves access to all iPhone buttons, ports, radar system, ultra-wide lens, and wireless charging.

The quick lock mechanism allows for convenient, secure phone mounting and dismounting, preventing accidental unlocking. Additionally, the all-metal construction of the cage provides comprehensive protection for your phone, aiding in shock absorption and safeguarding against scratches.

Note: The phone case width is 75.6mm / 2.97in. When using a third-party phone case with the cage, ensure accurate measurements for compatibility.

title: SmallRig Utility Frame for Ace Pro 2 / Ace Pro 5000
desc:
1. Specifically designed for Insta360 Ace Pro / Ace Pro 2, the cage provides comprehensive protection and diverse expansion options.

2. Quick and unobstructed battery replacement without disassembling the cage for enhanced convenience.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Utility Frame for Ace Pro 2 / Ace Pro 5000

SmallRig Utility Frame for Ace Pro 2 / Ace Pro 5000 is a comprehensive cage designed specifically for Insta360 Ace Pro / Ace Pro 2, offering various expansion interfaces. It provides comprehensive protection to the camera while catering to users' professional video shooting needs.

The cage features a user-friendly flip door with a one-touch locking design for swift and convenient camera mounting and dismounting. The precisely engineered 1:1 slotted design ensures unobstructed access to all camera interfaces, allowing for seamless battery replacement without the need to dismount the cage.

Equipped with cold shoe mounts on both the side and top, this cage seamlessly integrates with various cold shoe accessories like the DJI Mic 2 and more to enhance your videography experience. Moreover, the side panel features magnetic quick release interfaces compatible with original Insta360 magnetic quick release adapters, enabling effortless transitions between portrait and landscape orientations.

The kit includes a detachable dual claw action camera mount, which can be securely fastened to the bottom or side of the cage with the wrench, facilitating stable horizontal and vertical shooting. This setup ensures a secure and reliable filming experience in dynamic scenarios such as extreme sports with high-frequency vibrations.

The cage is compatible with the selfie stick (ID 4758), crab-shaped super clamp (ID 3757B), or handlebar mounting clamp (ID 4191) to cover various shooting scenarios such as travel or time-lapse photography, skateboard filming, cycling, and more. For car-mounted solutions, combine it with the suction cup camera mount (ID 3566).

Ace Pro 2

2. The cage features multiple built-in expansion interfaces, such as 1/4"-20 threaded holes, ARRI locating holes, a NATO rail, cold shoe mounts, and strap holes, allowing for the attachment of accessories like microphones, wireless transmitters, shoulder straps, and more.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Monitor Cage Kit for Atomos Shinobi II / Shinobi GO 5030

SmallRig Monitor Cage Kit for Atomos Shinobi II / Shinobi GO 5030 is designed to protect the camera body, provide additional expansion interfaces, and enhance monitoring in bright shooting environments with the sunhood. The kit includes the cage, sunhood VH2269, and a tempered glass screen protector.

The cage features a built-in NATO rail for quick attachment of accessories with NATO clamps, like magic arms (2071B) and monitor supports (BSE2385). It also has 1/4"-20 threaded holes for attaching accessories such as monitor supports (2903B) and magic arms (2070B), as well as ARRI locating holes for attaching magic arms (2115C). The incorporated cold shoe mount allows for attaching wireless microphones, video transmission devices, and more. Additionally, there are strap holes at the top and bottom for attaching shoulder straps.

The cage is lightweight and compact, weighing only 96.3g (3.4oz). It comes with a dedicated cable clamp to secure HDMI and USB-C cables (also compatible with Atomos HDMI and USB-C high-speed cables), protecting the interfaces and ensuring stable data transmission. The cable clamp can be installed directly on the monitor or mounted onto the cage.

Additionally, the kit includes a sunhood and tempered glass screen protector for improved monitoring in bright conditions and scratch protection for the screen.

Atomos Shinobi II / Shinobi GO

desc:
1. Detachable positioning pins prevent twisting, effectively ensuring equipment stability and safe shooting.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Anti-Twist Cold Shoe Mount Support (4pcs) 5033

SmallRig Anti-Twist Cold Shoe Mount Support (4pcs) 5033 is designed for attaching additional accessories such as video lights and microphones. It can be mounted on any accessory with a 1/4"-20 threaded interface. The set includes detachable positioning pins that align with the 1/4"-20 threaded interface with a locating hole, making it compatible with most SmallRig cages. When not in use, the positioning pin can be stored on the side of the cold shoe to prevent loss. An arrow on the cold shoe guides users in the accessory installation direction. The cold shoe mount features a unidirectional sliding design to prevent accidental slippage. Precision CNC machined for durability, it includes padding at the connection point to avoid scratching equipment.

Note: Not compatible with flash units featuring bottom metal contact points.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Cage for Canon EOS R5 Mark II with Cooling Fan CF-R20EP 5092

SmallRig Cage for Canon EOS R5 Mark II with Cooling Fan CF-R20EP 5092 is designed to protect the camera while offering versatile expansion options. It attaches to the camera with one 1/4"-20 screw at the bottom and two M3 screws on both sides, while integrated silicone pads prevent scratches. The cage allows unobstructed access to buttons, card slots, and battery compartments.

Equipped with multiple 1/4"-20 and 3/8"-16 threaded holes, as well as ARRI locating holes, it accommodates various accessories, including top handles (ID 4757, 3765) for smooth camera movements, side handles (ID 4015, 4346), monitor mounts (ID 2903B, 2904B), and magic arms (ID 3873). Three cold shoe mounts allow for attaching microphones (ID 3487) and LED lights (ID 4660).

The base plate integrates an Arca-Swiss quick-release plate for compatibility with DJI RS 2, RSC 2, RS 3, RS 3 Pro, RS 4, and RS 4 Pro stabilizers, facilitating swift transitions between handheld, stabilizer, and tripod setups.

A front 1/4"-20 locating hole compatible with the single rod clamp (ID 3276) allows for the attachment of a single 15mm rod and supports accessories like follow focus. Additionally, it features a strap slot for wrist straps (ID 3848, 2456) and a QD socket for shoulder straps (ID 4118). Moreover, a built-in double-head wrench at the bottom ensures effortless assembly and disassembly.

Work With

Canon EOS R5 Mark II paired with Cooling Fan CF-R20EP

title: SmallRig Cooling Fan for Canon EOS R5 Mark II & R5 5063
desc:
1. 7000 RPM high-speed fan with TEC cooling technology for efficient heat dissipation, significantly extending shooting time.

2. Two speed modes allow for adjustable fan speed to suit different environments and shooting needs.

3. Innovative snap-on design enables quick, tool-free installation and removal in just 1 second, enhancing portability and convenience.

4. Integrated mount bracket accommodates Canon, Sony, and other mirrorless cameras, offering greater versatility at a lower cost.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Cooling Fan for Canon EOS R5 Mark II & R5 5063

SmallRig Cooling Fan for Canon EOS R5 Mark II & R5 5063 is engineered to address overheating issues in Canon mirrorless cameras, enabling extended high-quality video recording sessions. Its advanced cooling system, which pairs a 7000 RPM fan with TEC cooling technology, ensures optimal heat dissipation and prevents camera overheating. The dual-speed fan features high-speed and low-speed modes to accommodate various shooting scenarios. Its tool-free snap-on design enables quick installation and removal, ensuring easy access to both the fan and the camera’s LCD screen. Additionally, it comes with a mount bracket for attaching Canon, Sony, and other mirrorless cameras. The cooling fan is also compatible with V-mount battery mount plate kits (ID 4064B, 4063B) and V-mount batteries (ID 3579, 4608, 4292) for efficient cooling and power supply.

Note:

1. After installing this product, the camera's LCD screen cannot be folded. Please remove the cooling fan before storing the LCD screen.

2. This product does not include a built-in battery and must be connected to an external power source to operate.

3. Avoid using or storing the product in humid environments, as it is not waterproof.

4. Do not obstruct the air inlet or outlet while the cooling fan is in operation.

5. Do not use the cooling fan when the camera is inactive to avoid internal condensation.

6. When not in use, press and hold the power button for about 2 seconds to enter standby mode or disconnect the power cable to turn off the device.

Work With

Canon EOS R5 Mark II & R5& R50 V & PowerShot V1

Compatible with the following Sony cameras when the mount bracket is removed: 

Sony ZV-E1, ZV-E10 II, ZV-E10, ZV-1, ZV-1F, Alpha 7 IV, Alpha 7S III, Alpha 7C, Alpha 7C II, Alpha 7CR, Alpha 6700, FX3, FX30

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Cage for Panasonic LUMIX S1 II / S1 IIE / S1R II / S5 II / S5 IIX / G9 II with DMW-BG1 / DMW-BG2 Battery Grip 5147

SmallRig Cage for Panasonic LUMIX S1 II / S1 IIE / S1R II / S5 II / S5 IIX / G9 II with DMW-BG1 / DMW-BG2 Battery Grip 5147 is designed to attach accessories and protect the camera. It locks the camera via one bottom 1/4"-20 screw and two side lock adapters, with rubber pads preventing scratches. Among its accessory mounting points, 1/4"-20 holes and ARRI 3/8"-16 locating holes support Top Handle 2165C, Side Handle HSN2093C, etc. for easy camera movement and more stability; and the top ARRI 3/8"-16 locating hole fits Monitor Mount 2903B. It also comes with two cold shoe mounts to attach the microphone, an LED video light; a top NATO rail for Top Handle 4483; a left NATO rail for Side Handle 4485; and a bottom QD socket to install a QD shoulder strap. At the bottom, there is an Arca-Swiss quick-release plate, suitable for DJI RS 2/ RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro gimbals and Arca-Swiss tripods, as well as a threaded hole for Arca-Swiss Quick Release Plate 3154. The item also features strap holes on both sides and the bottom, which are compatible with Hand Strap 3848, Shoulder Strap PSC2428, etc. Besides, a magnetic wrench is included for easy disassembly and assembly.

Note:

1. Please remove the side lock adapters before installing the cage.

2. The cage is compatible with Panasonic DMW-XLR1 / XLR2, recommended to use [SmallRig Top Handle for Sony XLR-K1M / K2M / K3M and Panasonic DMW-XLR1 / XLR2 3082], please remove the cable clamp at the bottom of the XLR before using 3082.

SmallRig Universal Shoulder Pad with 15mm Dual Rod Clamp 5153

SmallRig Universal Shoulder Pad with 15mm Dual Rod Clamp 5153 is designed to alleviate strain during shoulder-mounted shooting. It consists of a shoulder pad and a back pad, both of which can be securely attached to dual 15mm rods using one knob, providing superior stability.

The shoulder and back pads utilize soft cushioning for a snug fit and enhanced comfort, effectively reducing strain during extended shooting sessions. The shoulder pad is suitable for both shoulders and features a Velcro design for quick attachment and replacement.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig L-Shape Mount Plate for Sony Alpha 1 II / Alpha 9 III 5188

SmallRig L-Shape Mount Plate for Sony Alpha 1 II / Alpha 9 III 5188 facilitates a quick switch between landscape and portrait orientations. Designed to conform to the camera's curves, it enhances grip by providing additional support for the little finger. The bracket attaches securely to the bottom of the camera using a 1/4"-20 screw and features silicone pads to prevent scratches. It is also compatible with AirTag trackers, helping you keep track of your cameras and other devices.

The side plate features a 1/4"-20 threaded hole on the top, allowing for the mounting of the magic arm with dual ball heads (ID 3873) for a dual-camera setup. Its retractable design ensures ample space for unobstructed cable connections.

The bottom Arca-Swiss quick-release plate is compatible with Arca-type tripods and DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro gimbals, enabling seamless transitions between handheld, stabilizer, and tripod shooting. There is also a QD socket at the bottom for attaching shoulder straps (ID PSC2428).

title: SmallRig AD-50 Max Video Carbon Fiber Tripod 5201
desc:
1. FreeSpeed One-Step Locking and Quick Adjustment.

2. Providing low-angle shooting scenes.

3. Lightweight and compact, easy to carry, and stable.

4. Easy switch between Manfrotto and DJI RS quick release plates.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig AD-50 Max Video Carbon Fiber Tripod 5201

SmallRig AD-50 Max Video Carbon Fiber Tripod 5201 is designed for professional outdoor filmmaker. Featuring FreeSpeed technology, adopt a one-step locking system - operating a single toggle can lock two sections of legs quickly. Constructed with carbon fiber, lightweight design while delivering exceptional stability and high load-bearing capacity. Operating Altitude ranges from 35cm (13.8in) to 174cm (68.5in), and a compact storage length of 84cm (33.1in). The tripod includes a quick release mid-level spreader, a compact fluid head, featuring a damping system, allows you to pan the camera smoothly. When its center of gravity height is put at 55mm, the panning, and pre-set fixed counterbalance system can help precisely control the camera or other rigs weighing up to 4kg (8.8lb) for great counterbalance. The video head can carry as much as 8kg (17.6lb). It has a newly-designed snap-on quick-release plate mount, a more efficient mounting solution than traditional slide-on ones, which is DJI RS series quick release plate and 501PL quick release plate compatible to realize a free switch between stabilizer shooting and tripod shooting. The kit also features 1/4"-20 threaded holes for attaching accessories like magic arms, along with a built-in flat head screw for convenient camera installation and removal. It weighs only 3.6kg.

Note:

1. Before shooting, make sure the head, mid-level spreader, tripod locking status are in normal condition.

2. Avoid use in sandy or dusty environments to prevent the risk of damage.

3. Max payload of head: 8kg / 17.6lb (height at 174cm / 68.5in).

4. The weight capacity of the tripod head is not the absolute limit; it varies depending on the type of equipment, lenses used, accessories attached, and changes in the center of gravity.

5. Max payload of tripod: 15kg / 33lbs (tripod head detached, height at 164cm / 64.5in).

6. When adjusting the length of the mid-level spreader, need to pull out the angle adjustment knob at the top of the tripod.

Work With

501PL Quick Release Plate

DJI RS Series Quick Release Plate

title: SmallRig L-Shaped Mount Plate for Nikon Z5II 5256
desc:
1. Dual Arca-Swiss quick release plates for enhanced shooting efficiency: Enables quick switching between horizontal and vertical shooting on tripods, with a base plate compatible with DJI RS series stabilizers for fast installation and device switching.

2. Modular design: Includes detachable side plates and a baseplate, offering versatility for diverse shooting scenarios.

3. Full camera access: Features a built-in hinged door at the battery compartment for easy battery access, allows for a 105° rotation of the flip screen, and unobstructed routing for angled USB-C cables.

4. Multiple expansion interfaces: Includes 1/4"-20 threaded holes, 1/4"-20 locating holes, QD sockets, and strap slots.

5. Side plate extends by 21.5mm / 0.8in: Facilitates convenient cable management in portrait orientation.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig L-Shaped Mount Plate for Nikon Z5II 5256

SmallRig L-Shaped Mount Plate for Nikon Z5II 5256 is designed to facilitate quick switching between horizontal and vertical shooting while enhancing the camera’s grip. The L-plate is secured to the camera body using a 1/4"-20 screw and locating pins at the base, preventing deflection. Built-in silicone pads protect the camera from scratches.

The modular design allows the side plate to be detached and the base plate to be used independently, offering versatility for diverse shooting scenarios. Both the base and side plates are designed to avoid interference with camera ports and functions, such as the battery compartment, angled USB-C cables, and the 105° rotation of the flip screen.

The side plate extends by 21.5mm / 0.8in for convenient cable management in portrait orientation. It features multiple expansion interfaces, such as 1/4"-20 threaded holes, 1/4"-20 locating holes, QD sockets, and strap slots, compatible with accessories like QD shoulder straps (ID 4118B), microphones (ID 3468), and tripods (ID 3989, 4353) for multi-scenario shooting. The plate also features shoulder strap slots, allowing the camera to hang lens-down for safety.

The base and side plates feature Arca-Swiss quick release plates, compatible with Arca-Swiss tripods and stabilizers like the DJI RS 2, RSC 2, RS 3, RS 3 Pro, RS 4, RS 4 Pro, and RS 4 Mini, enabling quick switching between stabilizers, tripods, and handheld setups. For extended power, it allows for attaching V-mount battery plates (ID 4505) and V-mount batteries (ID 4608). The base plate is equipped with a magnetic flat wrench for easy assembly and disassembly.

Work With

Nikon Z5II, Z7, Z6, Z7II, Z6II, Z5

desc:

2. Three-Point Locking System: Secured with a bottom 1/4"-20 screw and dual side locating blocks, ensuring a stable installation during shooting.

3. Versatile Expansion Interfaces: Includes 1/4"-20 threaded holes, 1/4"-20 locating holes, 3/8"-16 threaded holes, ARRI 3/8"-16 locating holes, HawkLock quick release NATO rail, QD socket, and cold shoe mounts.

4. Built-in HawkLock Arca-Swiss quick release plate: Enables swift mounting on Arca-type tripods and DJI RS series gimbals, enhancing shooting efficiency.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Cage for Nikon Z5 / Z5II / Z6 / Z6II / Z7 / Z7II 5257

SmallRig Cage for Nikon Z5 / Z5II / Z6 / Z6II / Z7 / Z7II 5257 is designed to provide comprehensive protection for the camera while offering versatile expansion interfaces. The cage boasts a three-point locking system, using a bottom 1/4"-20 screw and dual side locating blocks to secure the camera and prevent deflection, while built-in pads protect it from scratches. Importantly, the cage does not interfere with the camera’s buttons, ports, flip screen, or battery compartment.

It is equipped with 1/4"-20 threaded holes, 1/4"-20 locating holes, and 3/8"-16 threaded holes for attaching accessories such as side handles (ID 4015) and top handles (ID 3765) for smooth camera movement, as well as monitor mounts (ID 2903B), tripods (ID 3989), power bank holders (ID BUB2336), and mini V-mount battery plates (ID 2987). The side features a 1/4"-20 locating hole for mounting single rod clamps (ID 3598), magic arms (ID 3873), and side handles (ID 4346).

The left side of the cage integrates a HawkLock quick release NATO rail, enabling the attachment of side handles (ID 4485) for quick accessory assembly and disassembly. It also features a cold shoe mount for microphones and lights, a strap slot for wrist straps (ID 3848), and a QD socket for shoulder straps (ID 4118B). It also features shoulder strap slots designed for carrying the camera with the lens facing down to prevent damage.

The bottom features an Arca-Swiss quick release plate for direct mounting to Arca-type tripods (ID 4060) and DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro / RS 4 Mini gimbals, enabling quick transitions between stabilizer, handheld, and tripod setups. For power solutions, it can be paired with V-mount battery plates (ID 4505) and V-mount batteries (ID 4608) for extended shooting time. The built-in double head wrench at the bottom facilitates easy assembly and disassembly.

Note: Please remove the locating blocks on both sides before installing the cage.

Work With

Nikon Z5II, Z7, Z6, Z7II, Z6II, Z5

SmallRig "Night Eagle" Cage for Nikon Z5 / Z5II / Z6 / Z6II / Z7 / Z7II 5258

SmallRig "Night Eagle" Cage for Nikon Z5 / Z5II / Z6 / Z6II / Z7 / Z7II 5258 is designed to provide comprehensive protection for the camera while offering versatile expansion interfaces. Its curved structure, embellished with gold accents, the classic Nikon red mark, and vintage leather, imbues the cage with a distinctive professional aesthetic. The cage boasts a three-point locking system, using a bottom 1/4"-20 screw and dual side M2.5 screws to secure the camera and prevent deflection, while built-in pads protect it from scratches. Importantly, the cage does not interfere with the camera’s buttons, ports, flip screen, or battery compartment.

Equipped with a detachable cold shoe mount featuring an anti-twist locating pin, the mount can be attached to the 1/4"-20 locating holes on both the sides and top of the cage, allowing for the mounting of accessories such as microphones (ID 3487) and video lights (ID 4660). The cage also features 1/4"-20 threaded holes, 1/4"-20 locating holes, 3/8"-16 threaded holes, and ARRI 3/8"-16 locating holes for attaching various accessories. These include side handles (ID 4015) and top handles (ID 3765) for smooth camera movement, as well as monitor mounts (ID 2903B), tripods (ID 3989), power bank holders (ID BUB2336), mini V-mount battery plates (ID 2987), and more. The side features a 1/4"-20 locating hole for mounting single rod clamps (ID 3598), magic arms (ID 3873), and side handles (ID 4346).

The left side of the cage integrates a HawkLock quick release NATO rail, enabling the attachment of side handles (ID 4485, 4840) for quick accessory assembly and disassembly. It also features a cold shoe mount for microphones and lights, a strap slot for wrist straps (ID 3848), and a QD socket for shoulder straps (ID 4118B). It also features shoulder strap slots designed for carrying the camera with the lens facing down to prevent damage.

The bottom features an Arca-Swiss quick release plate for direct mounting to Arca-type tripods (ID 4060) and DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro / RS 4 Mini gimbals, enabling quick transitions between stabilizer, handheld, and tripod setups. For power solutions, it can be paired with V-mount battery plates (ID 4505) and V-mount batteries (ID 4608) for extended shooting time. The built-in double head wrench at the bottom facilitates easy assembly and disassembly.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig x Potato Jet TRIBEX SE Hydraulic Tripod 5305

SmallRig x Potato Jet TRIBEX SE Hydraulic Tripod 5305 is designed for professional outdoor filmmakers, offering swift and convenient operation. Featuring X-Clutch hydraulic technology, squeezing a single clutch allows all legs to rapidly unfold, adjust the angle, and automatically lock in just one second, providing filmmakers with a seamless experience. The clutch can also be adjusted to 0° and 90° to accommodate various shooting scenarios. Constructed with aluminum alloy, both the legs and center column ensure a lightweight design while delivering exceptional stability and high load-bearing capacity. Operating altitude ranges from 23cm (9.1in) to 166cm (65.3in), and a compact storage length of 72cm (28.3in). The compact design of the tripod allows it to fit in any standard luggage (28").

The kit includes a compact fluid head, featuring a damping system, that allows you to pan the camera smoothly. When its center of gravity height is put at 50mm, the panning and pre-set fixed counterbalance system can help precisely control the camera or other rigs weighing up to 4kg for great counterbalance. The video head can carry as much as 6kg (13.2lb). It has a newly-designed snap-on quick-release plate mount, a more efficient mounting solution than traditional slide-on ones, which is the JI RS series quick release plate and 501PL quick release plate, compatible to realize a free switch between stabilizer shooting and tripod shooting. The tripod also features 1/4"-20 threaded holes for attaching accessories like magic arms, along with a built-in flat head screw for convenient camera installation and removal. It weighs only 3.7kg (8.1lbs).

Note:

1. Before shooting, make sure the head and tripod locking status are in normal condition.

2. Avoid use in sandy or dusty environments to prevent the risk of damage.

3. After using the short center column, mounted on the center column, need to ensure that the locking status.

4. Max payload of head: 6kg / 13.2lb (center column raised, leg angle at 22°, height at 166cm / 65.3in).

5. The weight capacity of the tripod head is not the absolute limit; it varies depending on the type of equipment, lenses used, accessories attached, and changes in the center of gravity.

6. Max payload of tripod: 15kg / 33lbs (center column not raised, tripod head detached, leg angle at 22°, height at 130cm / 51.2in).

7. After soaking in water, it needs to be dried before use.

Work With

501PL Quick Release Plate

DJI RS Series Quick Release Plate

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Arca-Standard Phone Support with Cold Shoe Mount 5339

SmallRig Arca-Standard Phone Support with Cold Shoe Mount 5339 is tailored for mobile content creation, compatible with iPhone 16 Pro Max, iPhone 16, iPhone 15 Pro Max, iPhone 15, iPhone 14, and Phones with MagSafe. This multifunctional cold shoe baseplate adapts to a variety of shooting scenarios, making it ideal for camera monitoring and stabilizer or tripod use in both horizontal and vertical orientations.

With a focus on compatibility, it incorporates 1/4"-20 threaded holes, cold shoe mounts, and Arca-type interfaces, allowing for effortless mounting of accessories such as video lights, microphones, and magic arms. The Magsafe quick release system enables swift assembly and disassembly, while the upper pivot offers tool-free 270° tilt adjustments, and the lower pivot provides 360° panoramic rotation and 240° tilt adjustments. Its sleek, foldable design ensures easy transport and storage.

Note:

1. When used in the horizontal shooting mode of the stabilizer, the support is for horizontal shooting only.

2. When used in the vertical shooting mode of the stabilizer, the support allows instant switching between horizontal and vertical orientations without re-leveling.

3. The phone clamp has a maximum load capacity of 500g / 17.6oz.

4. Excessive vibrations may cause phone detachment.

5. External impacts may risk equipment loss.

Work With

1. Suitable for phones with Magsafe functionality (without a case)

2. Compatible with phones in cases featuring magnetic rings

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig IG-01 IntegraGrip Cage 5355

SmallRig IG-01 IntegraGrip Cage 5355 is a versatile smartphone cage compatible with most phone models on the market. Designed for video enthusiasts, it enables professional-level recording, live streaming, and micro-filming at an affordable price.

Its ergonomic design ensures a comfortable and stable grip, allowing for quick phone attachment. Multiple 1/4"-20 threaded holes and cold shoe mounts facilitate the attachment of various accessories, such as external handles, tripods, microphones, and LED lights, enhancing production quality.

The standard QD socket is compatible with SmallRig’s quick release ecosystem, including top handles and Arca-Swiss mount plates. Additionally, it features dual sets of wrist strap and shoulder strap slots that accommodate professional straps up to 1mm (0.04″) in diameter, providing convenient carrying between shots. The phone clamp incorporates soft V-shaped rubber to prevent accidental button triggering.

Note:

1. Use with a well-fitted phone case of appropriate thickness and always confirm that the phone is securely clamped before shooting.

2. Not recommended for intense motion scenarios, as this could increase the risk of phone detachment.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig IG-02 IntegraGrip Cage (Wireless Controller) 5356

SmallRig IG-02 IntegraGrip Cage (Wireless Controller) 5356 is a versatile smartphone cage compatible with most phone models on the market. Designed for video enthusiasts, it enables professional-level recording, live streaming, and micro filmmaking at an affordable price. The cage includes a detachable wireless controller for seamless shutter and record control.

Its ergonomic design ensures a comfortable and stable grip, allowing for quick phone attachment. Multiple 1/4"-20 threaded holes and cold shoe mounts facilitate the attachment of various accessories, such as external handles, tripods, microphones, and LED lights, enhancing production quality.

The standard QD socket is compatible with SmallRig’s quick release ecosystem, including top handles and Arca-Swiss mount plates. Additionally, it features dual sets of wrist strap and shoulder strap slots that accommodate professional straps up to 1mm (0.04″) in diameter, providing convenient carrying between shots. The phone clamp incorporates soft V-shaped rubber to prevent accidental button triggering.

Wireless Controller Operation:
To power the device on/off, press and hold the button for 3 seconds. To connect, go to your smartphone's Bluetooth settings, select "SmallRig WR-06" from the device list, and initiate pairing. A successful connection is indicated when the status shows "Connected" (the green LED flashes during pairing and switches off when connected). A single button press starts photo capture or video recording, depending on the camera mode. To conserve power, the controller automatically shuts down after 5 minutes of being unpaired or 30 minutes of inactivity when paired. During charging, a steady red LED indicates active power input, while the green LED turns off; the red light extinguishes upon reaching full charge.

Note:

1. Use with a well-fitted phone case of appropriate thickness and always confirm that the phone is securely clamped before shooting.

2. Not recommended for intense motion scenarios, as this could increase the risk of phone detachment.

Work With

Universal fit for smartphones with these dimensions:

Thickness: ≤10mm (0.39″)

Width: 60–80mm (2.36–3.15″)

title: SmallRig RC 100C COB LED Video Light (Ink Blue / Lite Version) 5377
desc:
1. Compact, palm-sized design for easy storage and transport, ideal for mobile lighting.

2. Versatile power options—wireless and wired—for uninterrupted shooting.

3. Offers both wireless and manual control for precise lighting management.

4. Patented high Color Rendering Index (CRI) and powerful light source for superior illumination and color accuracy.

5. Offers a sunlight-simulating range of 2500K–10000K, 36,000+ color options, 12 specialized lighting effects, and instant access to 4 custom presets.

6. Includes a comprehensive range of accessories to enhance functionality.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig RC 100C COB LED Video Light (Ink Blue / Lite Version) 5377

SmallRig RC 100C COB LED Video Light is the latest addition to SmallRig's Portable RGBWW COB LED Video Light Ecosystem. This innovative light features a sleek cubic design and an efficient in-house cooling system. Compact and lightweight, the palm-sized RC 100C is only one-third the size of traditional COB LED lights, closely resembling the RED KOMODO, and weighs just 710g (25oz). This design facilitates easy storage and transport, making it ideal for on-the-go shooting.

Equipped with a Chip-on-Board light source, the RC 100C boasts a patented high Color Rendering Index (CRI) for exceptional illumination and color accuracy. At a distance of 1m (39.4in), it delivers 3,650 Lux at 5600K, which can be boosted to 11,000 Lux with the 45° mini reflector. With a CRI of 96+, a TLCI of 98+, an SSI (3200K) of 84, and TM-30 (3200K) Rf / Rg values of 94/102, this light ensures professional-grade color rendering and accurate reproduction of natural daylight. It also features cool and warm light options, HSI mode, RGBCW mode, special effects, and GEL modes, simulating sunlight from 2500K to 10000K with 12 special effects. Users can quickly access four sets of preset parameters for specific lighting settings.

Control options include wireless operation through the SmallGoGo app or DMX wired control with a separate adapter. Manual adjustments are facilitated by a 1.44-inch LCD color screen and two independent knobs.

The light offers versatile power options, allowing for wireless operation with either V-mount or NP-F970 batteries. It can also be charged via a USB-C port using accessories such as a power handle, PD power bank, or charging cable, as well as an AC to DC power adapter.

Constructed from V-0 flame-retardant PC+ABS and reinforced with metal at the base, the light is 30% lighter than full aluminum alloy bodies while maintaining durability for frequent use.

A comprehensive range of accessories is included, fully compatible with SmallRig's mini-mount lighting modifiers (D30, D60, 45x45 softbox, SP-mini spotlight), battery accessories (V-mount and NP-F970 batteries, charging grip handles, NP-F battery plates), and mounting accessories (quick release light stand adapters, Bowens mount adapters, magic arms with 1/4"-20 ARRI locating pins). This provides users with a one-stop solution for portability, convenient power supply, easy control, high-quality light source, and a complete accessory ecosystem.

Usage Scenarios: Perfect for content creation, including photography at anime conventions, events, travel, and weddings, as well as video production for YouTube episodes, interviews, documentaries, music videos, TV commercials, and live streaming.

Note: After operation, the COB LED beads, panel area, and both the top and bottom of the device may become hot. To ensure safety, please refrain from touching these areas until they have cooled down. Additionally, avoid obstructing the heat dissipation holes during use, and do not stare directly at the COB LED beads for extended periods.

title: SmallRig Lens Hood for FUJIFILM X half (Silver) 5393
desc:
1. Effectively blocks backlight, sidelight, and overhead light to prevent flare and maintain image quality.

2. Durable aluminum alloy construction protects lenses from impacts and scratches.

3. Silver hood interior features black paint finish to minimize glare from reflections.

4. Compatible with SmallRig's UV and VND (ND2 - ND5) filters designed for FUJIFILM X half.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Lens Hood for FUJIFILM X half (Silver) 5393

SmallRig Lens Hood for FUJIFILM X half (Silver) 5393 is designed to protect your camera lens from stray light that can compromise image quality. It securely attaches to the front of the lens with a thumbscrew, and all contact points feature protective pads to prevent scratches.

When installed, the hood effectively blocks backlight, sidelight, and overhead light, resulting in cleaner images with reduced flare. Its aluminum alloy construction ensures durable protection against bumps and scratches during shooting.

The silver version has a black paint finish on the interior to eliminate light reflections that cause glare. This hood is fully compatible with SmallRig's UV filters (ID 5214, 5392) and VND filters (ND2-ND5) (ID 5225, 5391) designed for the FUJIFILM X half camera.

Note:

1. When properly installed, the hood provides protection against frontal and side impacts. Avoid pulling it off from the rear.

2. After installing the hood, do not hold the camera by the hood alone, as this may lead to detachment.

Work With

FUJIFILM X half

The ergonomically shaped wooden handle provides exceptional comfort during extended shooting sessions while improving grip. Made from premium solid wood, it offers a naturally warm feel that avoids the cold touch of metal, adding distinctive vintage character to your camera. The side features an exclusive FUJIFILM X half engraving that blends seamlessly with the camera's elegant design.

The L-shape grip maintains full access to all camera interfaces, including the battery compartment, focus ring, memory card slot, and speaker ports. It’s lightweight and compact, weighing only 49g / 1.7oz. This unit includes a flat wrench for easy installation and removal, plus a commemorative hot shoe cover featuring FUJIFILM's signature soundwave engraving and the brand's founding year "1934," creating a nostalgic connection for FUJIFILM enthusiasts.

Note: As this product uses natural solid wood, variations in wood grain between individual units are normal.

title: SmallRig RC 220B Pro Combo LED Video Light Kit (EU) 5415
desc:
1. Modular Body Design (Three Patents: V Mount Adapter - Utility Model; Combination of Light and Adapter - Utility Model; Overall Body - Design Patent): The adapter and light body are connected via a V mount quick release mechanism, revolutionizing traditional connection methods for enhanced convenience and efficiency (swift attachment and convenient storage; the adapter features an integrated gallium nitride chip for reduced size, making it 24% shorter in length compared to the previous generation;  4% increase in conversion efficiency).

2. Multiple Power Supply Options: Supports adapters, V mount batteries, NP-F970 (requires NPF adapter), providing three versatile power supply options, enabling flexibility and unrestricted usage in various settings.

3. Ultra-High Brightness: Customized optical lens design results in a 10% decrease in power consumption compared to the previous generation while with the same brightness. Incorporating Three Times Optics for high brightness, uniform light distribution, and a high color rendering index of 95+.

4. Low Color Deviation: Incorporates a new COB light source ensuring consistent color temperature throughout (DUV value of ±0.0015), minimizing color deviation within the effective color temperature range.

5. Damping Design: Features support column damping design to facilitate the gradual descent of the light.

6. Diverse Control Options: Supports four control methods: manual control on the light body, via App, control panel, and DMX.

(Adjustable locking handle; umbrella mount hole; ultra-quiet operation with 28dB noise level at a 1-meter distance; all-metal support components; 6-meter power cord for extended reach; portable storage bag; versatile Bowens mount, offering a wide range of compatibility with different accessories)

title: SmallRig AD14 Heavy-Duty Carbon Fiber Tripod 5441
desc:
1. Ultralight at 2.7kg (6lb): Easy to carry and ideal for on-the-go shooting.

2. Built-in swivel-foot design: Ensures stable support on uneven or rocky terrain.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig AD14 Heavy-Duty Carbon Fiber Tripod 5441

SmallRig AD14 Heavy-Duty Carbon Fiber Tripod 5441 is designed for videography, combining portability and robust performance for dynamic shooting scenarios.

Constructed from carbon fiber, the tripod features a 2-2-1 segmented leg design and built-in anti-detachment swivel feet, ensuring optimal stability on uneven or rocky terrain. Despite its sturdy construction, the entire system weighs only 2.7kg (6lb), making it exceptionally easy to transport in fast-paced shooting environments.

The tripod is equipped with a precision-engineered aluminum alloy fluid head that supports a payload capacity of 10kg ((22.05lb). This head features a tilt damping adjustment knob, allowing for precise control for gears of different weight, ensuring smooth camera movements for cinematic-quality shoots. It is also compatible with standard Manfrotto quick release plates that support lateral mounting, enabling quick and secure camera attachment.

With a working height range of 84cm to 185cm (33.1in to 72.8in) and a compact storage height of 87cm (34.2in), the AD14 offers versatile positioning options while remaining highly portable.

desc:

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Cycling Camera Mount 5459

SmallRig Cycling Camera Mount 5459 is specifically designed for cycling mounting applications, featuring aerospace-grade aluminum alloy construction for exceptional durability. When paired with 360° cameras, it delivers drone-like cinematic follow shots.

This comprehensive kit includes one 360° dual head super clamp, one crab-shaped clamp, one camera extension arm (extends to 120cm / 47.2" and collapses to 45cm / 17.7"), and one universal action camera mount.

Engineered for maximum adaptability, the clamps securely grip cylindrical objects ranging from 14 mm to 58 mm (0.5 to 2.3") in diameter, making them ideal for mounting on bicycle frames or motorcycle bodies. The clamping jaws are equipped with rubber pads for anti-scratch protection and enhanced stability.

The integrated design at the joint between the crab-shaped clamp and magic arm effectively prevents loosening or detachment during use. Additionally, the 360° adjustable ball head allows for precise positioning, giving you complete control over your setup.

title: SmallRig Baseplate with Airtag Slot for Sony Alpha 7C II / Alpha 7CR (Black) 5481
desc:
1. Fits snugly against the camera body to protect the base from scratches and impacts.

2. Built-in AirTag slot securely houses an AirTag for seamless camera tracking.

3. Features a hinged arm at the battery compartment for enhanced ergonomics and pinky finger support.

4. Integrated Arca-Swiss quick release plate facilitates swift transitions between Arca-type tripods and gimbals (DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro).

5. Offers various mounting options, including multiple 1/4"-20 threaded holes, one QD socket, and one strap hole.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Baseplate with Airtag Slot for Sony Alpha 7C II / Alpha 7CR (Black) 5481

SmallRig Baseplate with Airtag Slot for Sony Alpha 7C II / Alpha 7CR (Black) 5481 is designed to enhance grip comfort while protecting your camera from impacts. It securely attaches to the camera using a 1/4"-20 screw and features protective pads to prevent scratches and deflection. This mount plate is equipped with an AirTag slot for AirTag tracker attachment, enabling seamless camera tracking. Additionally, it features a hinged arm at the battery compartment for improved ergonomics and pinky finger support.

The plate incorporates multiple 1/4"-20 threaded holes at the bottom for attaching accessories like wireless shooting grips (ID 4551), while an integrated Arca-Swiss mount plate ensures seamless compatibility with Arca-type tripods and DJI gimbals (DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro), allowing for versatile shooting setups.

desc:
1. Full-Cover Cage with Unobstructed Access: Ensures all-around protection and smooth operation.

2. Built-in Arca-Swiss Quick Release Plates: Integrated on the bottom and left side for seamless switching between landscape and portrait orientations.

3. Included Detachable Cold Shoe Mount: Enables horizontal cold shoe mounting in both orientations.

4. DJI Gimbal Compatibility: Bottom quick release plate allows direct mounting to DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro gimbals.

5. Versatile Expansion Options: Features 1/4"-20 threaded holes, 1/4"-20 & 3/8"-16 ARRI locating holes, cold shoe mounts, and more for flexible shooting setups.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Cage for Canon EOS R1 5413

SmallRig Cage for Canon EOS R1 5413 enhances protection and expandability while maintaining full functionality. Featuring an integrated, full-cover construction specifically engineered for the EOS R1, this cage offers comprehensive protection while ensuring unobstructed access to all buttons for smooth operation.

The cage boasts a three-point locking system, using a bottom 1/4"-20 screw and dual side locating blocks to secure the camera and prevent deflection, while built-in silicone pads protect the camera from scratches.

Both the bottom and left sides incorporate built-in Arca-Swiss quick release plates, ensuring compatibility with Arca-type tripods (ID 4059) The bottom plate can be directly mounted to DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro gimbals, enabling quick switching between landscape and portrait orientations for rapid scene transitions.

The package includes a detachable cold shoe mount, allowing horizontal cold shoe mounting in both shooting orientations. The cage also features multiple expansion interfaces, including 1/4"-20 threaded holes, 1/4"-20 & 3/8"-16 ARRI locating holes, cold shoe mounts, strap slots, and QD sockets. These interfaces support various accessories such as handles (ID 3765, 4015), shoulder straps (ID PSC2428), and wrist straps (ID 3848).

Work With

Canon EOS R1

desc:

2. Built-In Swivel-Foot Design: Ensures stable support on uneven or rocky terrain.

3. Manfrotto-Compatible Lateral Plate Mounting: Enhances operational safety and workflow efficiency.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig FSD14 FreeSpeed Heavy-Duty Aluminum Alloy Tripod 5442

SmallRig FSD14 FreeSpeed Heavy-Duty Aluminum Alloy Tripod 5442 is engineered for videography, combining rapid deployment with exceptional stability. Featuring a one-step leg deployment knob, it allows for quick height adjustments, streamlining your on-site workflow.

Constructed from aluminum alloy, the tripod features a 2-2-1 segmented leg design and built-in anti-detachment swivel feet, ensuring optimal stability on uneven or rocky terrain. Despite its sturdy construction, the entire system weighs only 3.8kg (8.4lb).

Equipped with a lightweight fluid head with fixed damping system that supports up to 8kg (17.64lb), it ensures smooth and precise pan-and-tilt movements for expert-level filming. It is also compatible with standard Manfrotto quick release plates that support lateral mounting, enabling quick and secure camera attachment.

With a working height range of 84cm to 185cm (33.1in to 72.8in) and a compact storage height of 88cm (34.7in), the AD14 offers versatile positioning options while remaining highly portable.

desc:
1. Integrated Arca-Swiss Quick Release Plate: Effortlessly switch between handheld, tripod, and gimbal setups (compatible with DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro).

2. Unlimited Expansion: Accommodates handles, mics, monitor mounts, and other accessories. Built-in “HawkLock” NATO rail allows for quick attachment of “HawkLock” accessories such as side handles (ID 4485), top handles (ID 4483), and monitor mounts (ID 4487).

3. Lightweight & Secure: Weighs only 100g / 3.5oz for easy carrying. Two-point locking mechanism securely fixes the camera.

4. Precision Engineering: Provide full access to all camera buttons and ports, ensuring unobstructed EVF tilt.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Half Cage for Sony FX2 5591

SmallRig Half Cage for Sony FX2 5591 is designed for seamless accessory expansion and rapid workflow transitions. An Arca-Swiss quick release plate at the base enables swift transitions between handheld, tripod, and gimbal setups (compatible with DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro stabilizers).

The detachable top plate features a NATO rail, accommodating Sony’s XLR top handle or SmallRig’s rotating top handle (ID 4152) without interfering with the EVF. With precision cutouts, this cage ensures that the camera’s tiltable EVF, buttons, and ports remain fully accessible.

Incorporating multiple mounting points, including 1/4"-20 threaded holes, 3/8"-16 ARRI locating holes, and a “HawkLock” NATO rail, it allows for quick attachment of accessories like side handles (ID 4485) and top handles (ID 4483). A cold shoe mount enables the attachment of devices such as the DJI Mic 2 or LED lights, while a QD socket at the base accommodates shoulder straps for enhanced portability.

The bottom quick release plate, paired with the “HawkLock” H38 Arca-Swiss quick release mount plate (ID 4486), facilitates rapid slide-in attachment with an auto-locking mechanism. Additionally, the base is equipped with a magnetic Allen wrench for quick assembly and disassembly.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Quick Release Plate for AirTag MD4150

SmallRig Quick Release Plate for AirTag MD4150 is designed for tracking the camera location easily via using the AirTag.The built-in AirTag mounting compartment allows AirTag to be quickly mounted on the bottom of the camera body. The mounting compartment is designed with a sleek hidden style to hide the AirTag effectively; the compartment cover is made of PC to avoid interfering with the tracking distance of the AirTag. Using durable M2.5 screws to prevent AirTag from being removed quickly, so as to maximize the possibility of finding your camera. The quick-release plate has a built-in Arca-Swiss plate, which can be quickly connected to tripods and other accessories for shooting; the bottom has a built-in 1/4"-20 threaded hole, which can be attached to the quick-release plate to achieve different setups in different scenes; the bottom plate leaves a strap hole to compatible with the wrist strap. Also, the AirTag mounting compartment has built-in EVA pads to protect the AirTag and prevent noise from moving the device.

Note:

1. After the AirTag is attached to the product, use the iPhone APP "Find My" to track the AirTag up to 10 meters via Bluetooth proximity.

2. After the AirTag is attached to the product, use the iPhone APP "Find My" to track the AirTag up to 100 meters or more.

3. The package doesn’t include the AirTag.

Work With

Sony Alpha 7S III/ Alpha 7R III /Alpha 7 III / Alpha 7R IV / Alpha 7 IV / Alpha 7C / Alpha 7C II / Alpha 7C R / Alpha 7R V / Alpha 9 III / Alpha 6700 / Alpha 6400 /FX30 / FX3 / ZV-E10 / ZV-E10 II

title: SmallRig Multifunctional Card Reader & Storage Case (CFexpress Type A) 5361
desc:
1. Triple-Slot Data Transfer: Simultaneously read and transfer files between CFexpress Type A, SD, and Micro SD cards for maximum workflow efficiency.

2. Dedicated Power Input Port: Ensures uninterrupted power delivery for stable data transfers.

3. Innovative AirTag Slot: Track and secure your memory cards with Apple’s Find My network.

4. USB 3.2 Gen2 & Active Cooling: Delivers 10Gbps (1250MB/s) transfer speeds with an aluminum heatsink for sustained performance (1GB file in 2 sec).

5. Smart Card Management: Stores 4x SD, 2x Micro SD, and 4x CFexpress Type B cards with status toggles (empty / full).
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Multifunctional Card Reader & Storage Case (CFexpress Type A) 5361

SmallRig Multifunctional Card Reader & Storage Case (CFexpress Type A) 5361 provides a professional-grade solution for creators. This unit offers secure, high-capacity card storage alongside high-speed data transfer capabilities, supporting simultaneous use of CFexpress Type A, SD, and Micro SD (TF) formats for maximum efficiency. Equipped with a built-in USB 3.2 Gen 2 chip, it delivers speeds of up to 10Gbps (1250MB/s), while the aluminum heat sink and auxiliary USB-C power port ensure stable performance. The dedicated AirTag slot allows for safer memory card management.

The case stores up to 10 cards: 4x SD, 2x Micro SD (TF), and 4x CFexpress Type A. Each slot features a silicone pad for secure storage and a dial key to mark card status (empty / full). Additionally, it comes with a carabiner for enhanced portability and a flat wrench for emergency disassembly.

Note:

1. Speed throttles if host USB-C port is below USB 3.2 Gen2.

2. Ensure correct card orientation before insertion.

3. Card priority: When reading SD + Micro SD simultaneously, bandwidth prioritizes the higher-speed card.

4. Operating Temp: -10°C to 50°C (14℉ to 122℉) | Storage Temp: -20°C to 65°C (-4℉ to 149℉).

5. Avoid inserting / removing other cards during data transfer to prevent data loss.

6. Do not plug / unplug the auxiliary USB-C power during transfer, as PD protocol variations may interrupt transmission.

7. Mobile phone / tablet use: Keep file manager active in background to avoid interruptions.

Work With

1. USB: 3.2 Gen2 (10Gbps / 1250MB/s), backward-compatible with 3.1 / 3.0 / 2.0

2. SD Cards: UHS-II (SD / SDXC / SDHC, up to 312MB/s), UHS-I compatible

3. Micro SD: UHS-II (Micro SD / SDXC / SDHC, up to 312MB/s), UHS-I compatible
